subject: Add PWA support with installable app and update prompts
body:
- Add vite-plugin-pwa for service worker and manifest generation
- Create app icon (SVG + PNG generation via sharp)
- Add PWAUpdatePrompt component for non-disruptive update notifications
- Configure Workbox with Google Fonts caching
- Add PWA meta tags to index.html (theme-color, apple-touch-icon, etc.)
